text:
That was fast! Robin Thicke’s girlfriend, April Love Geary, is pregnant again with their second child six months after welcoming their daughter Mia.

Related: Celebrity Babies of 2018 A new bundle of joy! Scroll through to see all the cute babies who were born to famous parents in 2018, so far! Thank You! You have successfully subscribed. Subscribe to newsletters Subscribe By signing up, I agree to the Terms and Privacy Policy and to receive emails from Us Weekly Deal of the Day […]

The model shared a cute video of their baby girl holding an sonogram photo via Instagram on Tuesday, August 21. “Well someone is going to be a big sister next year! We’re so excited to share with y’all that I’m expecting again!” she wrote. “We find out Saturday if it’s a boy or a girl! What do you guys think it’s going to be? Forgot to mention the due date is Robins birthday!”

The musician, 41, went on to post a video from their ultrasound appointment. “‘They said we couldn’t make another anthem, so we went and made another anthem!’ Thank you April,” he gushed.

Related: Sexy Celeb Dads See the hottest Hollywood papas with their adorable kids

Back in May, he gushed over Geary on Mother’s Day. “Thank you my @aprillovegeary for bringing me so much joy in so many ways! Thank you for Mia. Happy hot Mama day. i love you.”

Thicke is also dad of 8-year-old son Julian with ex-wife Paula Patton.

Related: Famous Celebrity Families See pictures of the most well-known Hollywood broods

Thicke and Geary began dating shortly after he split from Patton after 10 years of marriage. They made their red carpet debut as a couple at Cannes Film Festival in March 2015 two months after the divorce was finalized.
